definition: to avert/to prevent/to avoid/to refrain from
to avoid/to shun/to flee/to escape/to keep away from/to leave/to hide from
to excuse sb/to exempt/to remove or dismiss from office/to avoid/to avert/to escape/to be prohibited
old variant of 絻[wen4]
unavoidably

sentences.english: Perfecting the contract text and avoid legal loss.
sentences.chinese: 完善合同文本，避免法律损失。

sentences.english: Avoid hard-coding blank spaces or tabs at the end of a line of sample code.
sentences.chinese: 要避免在示例代码行的结尾用硬编码空格或制表符。

sentences.english: The utility model can effectively avoid foreign odor and harmful gas emitted by the contamination of the drain.
sentences.chinese: 能有效避免排污管被污染而散发异味和有害气体。

sentences.english: Avoid mini skirts, too much make up, and excessive jewelry.
sentences.chinese: 避免迷你裙，化太浓的妆和过多的首饰。

sentences.english: Non-truth derived from the nature of truth, is inevitable.
sentences.chinese: 非真理源出于真理的本质，是不可避免的。

sentences.english: Follow the approach outlined in this article to avoid this pitfall.
sentences.chinese: 通过遵循本文给出的方法可以避免这个失误。

sentences.english: Avoid use of future tense; it is rarely necessary.
sentences.chinese: 避免使用未来式，这是很少需要的。

sentences.english: Avoid shock loading and high overloads during mill operation.
sentences.chinese: 轧钢时，避免冲击负荷及过负荷运作。

sentences.english: It helps you avoid the mistakes people made in the past.
sentences.chinese: 它也可以帮助你避免犯前人犯过的错误。

sentences.english: Avoid using the word to speak against yourself or to gossip about others.
sentences.chinese: 避免说反话或别人的八卦。

sentences.english: One must wash his hands before meals to avoid diseases.
sentences.chinese: 为了避免病从口入，饭前要洗手。

sentences.english: He said some secrecy was important to avoid detection by the two governments.
sentences.chinese: 他表示为避免两国政府侦查发现，保密工作很重要。

sentences.english: Avoid abbreviations, because people tend to spell out words in searches.
sentences.chinese: 避免使用缩写，人们在搜索时，一般会拼写出单词。

sentences.english: Try to avoid sending large records to the front end to be transformed there.
sentences.chinese: 尽量避免发送大型记录到前端并在那里转换。

sentences.english: Next, must display sincerely, avoids speaking insincerely.
sentences.chinese: 其次，要表现出真诚，避免言不由衷。

sentences.english: I figured instead of killing other people, I’d just put the truck in the ditch.
sentences.chinese: 我在想的是为了避免别人送命，我得将卡车开向路堤。

definition: to prevent/to guard against/to take precautions
in order to avoid/so as not to
as much as possible/to the greatest extent
as much as possible/to the greatest extent
(so as) to avoid/to prevent/(just) in case
to evade/to dodge
to take note of/to pay attention to
as far as possible/to do one's utmost
to put an end to
to lessen/to decrease/to reduce/to lower
to avoid as taboo/to avoid by all means
best/(you) had better (do what we suggest)
to lead to/to create/to cause/to bring about
to avoid/to evade/to keep away from
remember at all costs
don't!/must not
if not/otherwise/else/or else
